verses.verse: וְאִם־ <WH518> now if זֶ֥בַח <WH2077> [be] a sacrifice שְׁלָמִ֖ים <WH8002> of peace offering קָרְבָּנ֑וֹ <WH7133> And if his oblation אִ֤ם <WH518> if מִן־ <WH4480> out הַבָּקָר֙ <WH1241> [it] of the herd ה֣וּא <WH1931> he מַקְרִ֔יב <WH7126> if he offer אִם־ <WH518> whether זָכָר֙ <WH2145> whether [it be] a male אִם־ <WH518> or נְקֵבָ֔ה <WH5347> or female תָּמִ֥ים <WH8549> it without blemish יַקְרִיבֶ֖נּוּ <WH7126> he shall offer לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְסָמַ֤ךְ <WH5564> And he shall lay יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> his hand עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> upon the head קָרְבָּנ֔וֹ <WH7133> of his offering וּשְׁחָט֕וֹ <WH7819> and kill פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> it [at] the door אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation וְזָרְק֡וּ <WH2236> shall sprinkle בְּנֵי֩ <WH1121> sons אַהֲרֹ֨ן <WH175> and Aaron's הַכֹּהֲנִ֧ים <WH3548> the priests אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּ֛ם <WH1818> the blood עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

וְהִקְרִיב֙ <WH7126> And he shall offer מִזֶּ֣בַח <WH2077> of the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִ֔ים <WH8002> of the peace offering אִשֶּׁ֖ה <WH801> an offering made by fire לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <WH2459> the fat הַֽמְכַסֶּ֣ה <WH3680> that covereth אֶת־ <WH853> הַקֶּ֔רֶב <WH7130> the inwards וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַחֵ֔לֶב <WH2459> and all the fat אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> that עַל־ <WH5921> is on הַקֶּֽרֶב׃ <WH7130> that [is] upon the inwards

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> And the two הַכְּלָיֹ֔ת <WH3629> kidneys וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <WH2459> and the fat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עֲלֵהֶ֔ן <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is on הַכְּסָלִ֑ים <WH3689> that [is] on them which [is] by the flanks וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַיֹּתֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH3508> and the caul עַל־ <WH5921> of הַכָּבֵ֔ד <WH3516> above the liver עַל־ <WH5921> with הַכְּלָי֖וֹת <WH3629> with the kidneys יְסִירֶֽנָּה׃ <WH5493> it shall he take away

וְהִקְטִ֨ירוּ <WH6999> shall burn אֹת֤וֹ <WH853> בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> sons אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> And Aaron's הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <WH4196> it on the altar עַל־ <WH5921> on הָ֣עֹלָ֔ה <WH5930> upon the burnt sacrifice אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is on הָעֵצִ֖ים <WH6086> which [is] upon the wood אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is on הָאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> that [is] on the fire אִשֵּׁ֛ה <WH801> [it is] an offering made by fire רֵ֥יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <WH5207> of a sweet לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD פ

וְאִם־ <WH518> if מִן־ <WH4480> is from הַצֹּ֧אן <WH6629> [be] of the flock קָרְבָּנ֛וֹ <WH7133> And if his offering לְזֶ֥בַח <WH2077> for a sacrifice שְׁלָמִ֖ים <WH8002> of peace offering לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God זָכָר֙ <WH2145> male א֣וֹ <WH176> or נְקֵבָ֔ה <WH5347> or female תָּמִ֖ים <WH8549> it without blemish יַקְרִיבֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH7126> he shall offer

אִם־ <WH518> If כֶּ֥שֶׂב <WH3775> a lamb הֽוּא־ <WH1931> he מַקְרִ֖יב <WH7126> If he offer אֶת־ <WH853> קָרְבָּנ֑וֹ <WH7133> for his offering וְהִקְרִ֥יב <WH7126> then shall he offer אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> it before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְהִקְרִ֨יב <WH7126> And he shall offer מִזֶּ֣בַח <WH2077> of the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִים֮ <WH8002> of the peace offering אִשֶּׁ֣ה <WH801> an offering made by fire לַיהוָה֒ <WH3068> unto the LORD חֶלְבּוֹ֙ <WH2459> the fat הָאַלְיָ֣ה <WH451> rump תְמִימָ֔ה <WH8549> thereof [and] the whole לְעֻמַּ֥ת <WH5980> hard הֶעָצֶ֖ה <WH6096> by the backbone יְסִירֶ֑נָּה <WH5493> it shall he take off וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <WH2459> and the fat הַֽמְכַסֶּ֣ה <WH3680> that covereth אֶת־ <WH853> הַקֶּ֔רֶב <WH7130> the inwards וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַחֵ֔לֶב <WH2459> and all the fat אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> that עַל־ <WH5921> is on הַקֶּֽרֶב׃ <WH7130> that [is] upon the inwards

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> And the two הַכְּלָיֹ֔ת <WH3629> kidneys וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <WH2459> and the fat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עֲלֵהֶ֔ן <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is on הַכְּסָלִ֑ים <WH3689> that [is] upon them which [is] by the flanks וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַיֹּתֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH3508> and the caul עַל־ <WH5921> of הַכָּבֵ֔ד <WH3516> above the liver עַל־ <WH5921> with הַכְּלָיֹ֖ת <WH3629> with the kidneys יְסִירֶֽנָּה׃ <WH5493> it shall he take away

וְהִקְטִיר֥וֹ <WH6999> shall burn הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> And the priest הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חָה <WH4196> it upon the altar לֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> [it is] the food אִשֶּׁ֖ה <WH801> of the offering made by fire לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD פ
וְאִ֥ם <WH518> if עֵ֖ז <WH5795> [be] a goat קָרְבָּנ֑וֹ <WH7133> And if his offering וְהִקְרִיב֖וֹ <WH7126> then he shall offer לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> it before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְהִקְרִ֤יב <WH7126> And he shall offer מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <WH4480> at קָרְבָּנ֔וֹ <WH7133> thereof his offering אִשֶּׁ֖ה <WH801> [even] an offering made by fire לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <WH2459> the fat הַֽמְכַסֶּ֣ה <WH3680> that covereth אֶת־ <WH853> הַקֶּ֔רֶב <WH7130> the inwards וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַחֵ֔לֶב <WH2459> and all the fat אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> that עַל־ <WH5921> is on הַקֶּֽרֶב׃ <WH7130> that [is] upon the inwards

וְהִקְטִירָ֥ם <WH6999> shall burn הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> And the priest הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חָה <WH4196> them upon the altar לֶ֤חֶם <WH3899> [it is] the food אִשֶּׁה֙ <WH801> of the offering made by fire לְרֵ֣יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֔חַ <WH5207> for a sweet כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֵ֖לֶב <WH2459> all the fat לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> [is] the LORD'S

חֻקַּ֤ת <WH2708> statute עוֹלָם֙ <WH5769> [It shall be] a perpetual לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1755> for your generations בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all מֽוֹשְׁבֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH4186> throughout all your dwellings כָּל־ <WH3605> any חֵ֥לֶב <WH2459> neither fat וְכָל־ <WH3605> any דָּ֖ם <WH1818> nor blood לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> that ye eat פ
